dict.acceptation: 传统的；口传的；惯例的；因袭的；

sent.orig: Shao-Jun Lang Chinese paintings are divided into three types-the traditional type, pan-traditional and non-traditional type.
sent.trans: 郎绍君先生把中国画分为三大类型——传统型、泛传统型和非传统型。

sent.orig: Chinese traditional medicine is treasure of Chinese traditional physic.
sent.trans: 中药是我国传统医学的瑰宝。

sent.orig: Traditional and non-traditional security threats are intertwined as the world entered into a new century.
sent.trans: 进入新世纪以来，传统安全威胁与非传统安全威胁相互交织。

sent.orig: Colorful silk balls are traditional national traditional of the Zhuang nationality.
sent.trans: 摘要绣球是壮族传统的民族手工艺品。

sent.orig: It includes not only practical forms of traditional decoration, also the decoration theory of traditional system.
sent.trans: 它不仅包括传统装饰的实物形式，还包括传统系统的装饰理论。
